header.title: File Generator
header.abstract: This document describes the file generator of Cocoon.

s1.title: File Generator
s1.p: The file generator reads an xml document from the local file system or from any url. While url generator may appear to be a more suitable name, it's known as the file generator for historical reasons.
The file generator is the default generator.

ul.li: Cacheable: yes - uses the last modification date of the xml document for validation.

s1.p: The location of the source xml document is specified in the pipeline by the src attribute.
s1.source: <map:generate src="document.xml" type="file"/> <!-- The type attribute can be omitted as it is the default generator. -->
s1.p: You can use an absolute filesystem pathname. See the explanation of file: URLs
